name: Tamagesit
description:
Now with a web, Mac, Linux and new Windows version! If the "Tamagesit_Update" file doesn't work, try the "Tamagesit_Win_NoAlwaysOnTop"

You have to take care of your small gesit until it's ready to join the afterlife. Each gesit has its own most and least favorite food, so be careful what you feed them!

You can also pet your gesit to make it happier!

* * *

Tamagesit is a game made by Tyu for the Pet Jam 2015 with a lot of help from Pol

Colors were a lot inspired by palettes made by pixel artist Syosa

You can find the AlwaysOnTop script here.

* * *

Please keep in mind that this is the very first game I coded by myself on Unity, and that it is still in development. Since the end of the Pet Jam I added:

- One new gesit and its accessories!

- Particles!

- Some animations!

- More food!

- Some things that were supposed to be there in the 1st build but didn't show for some reason? (like an actual end screen)

Next (and hopefully final) update will have:

- Sound!

- A 3rd and final gesit!

- More feedbacks and particles!

- Some very subtle and barely distinguishable polish else I won't be satisfied.
